q: Does Attribix work with Shopify and WordPress?
a: Yes—Shopify and WooCommerce are supported. Connect your store and start streaming events quickly.

q: How do you track conversions accurately?
a: Client-side pixels plus server-side APIs with deduplication and robust match keys (hashed email/phone, fbp/fbc, event_id).
Last‑Click, First‑Click, Linear, Time‑Decay. Position‑based (40‑20‑40) is available in Settings.
Consent Mode v2, TCF pass‑through, IP anonymization, region‑based disables, and configurable retention.

q: Can I export or use an API?
a: Yes—CSV exports plus webhooks and a token‑based API for automation.
Map UTM keys, define grouping rules (contains/regex), and exclude self‑referrals.

q: How do refunds, tax & shipping affect revenue?
a: Choose gross/net/confirmed revenue and whether taxes/shipping are included; refunds can be immediate or when processed.
Yes—verify tracking and reports during the trial before upgrading.
